name: oskar
description: Oskar is a Slackbot that tracks how happy people are at work

xoxb-8299084678-agJsMKi6IEhiJCi9GJ97xWkz.description: Your team's Slackbot token (create a new token here: https://yourteam.slack.com/services/new/bot)
The channel that all user notifications go into. If not available, Oskar is going to ping each user individually

DISABLED_USERS.description: Optional: disable users if you want specific people on your team to not receive any Oskar messages at all. Find your user IDs here: https://api.slack.com/methods/users.list/test

DISABLED_CHANNELS.description: Optional: disable channels that Oskar is part of (you should disable the default channel that Slack added). Find your channel IDs here: https://api.slack.com/methods/channels.list/test

lookback.description: Optional: Simple HTTP auth for the dashboard. Make sure to share those with your team

i3#68&te.description: Optional: Simple HTTP auth for the dashboard. Make sure to share those with your team
